property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn this card over.

property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn it over.

property.value: Immediate: During a faceoff, exhaust this card to flip an additional card

property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: During a faceoff, exhaust this card to put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony token into play

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn it over.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Pay 1AT to give a Troublemaker +2 or -2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn it over.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff, you may exhaust this card to banish one of their Friends until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn it over.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Score Phase, you may exhaust this card to contribute its power to confronting a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal a Friend this way, you may move one of your characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand, this card has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, it gets +3 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand, this card has Swift. When you move this card to a Problem, you may move another one of your characters to that Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, you may frighten a Friend. At the start of your turn, each opponent retires a frightened Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may discard a card to challenge an opposing Troublemaker with this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put the top card of each player's deck into that player's discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, your Mane Character gets +3 power until the end of the faceoff. Immediate: Exhaust this card to give enother card involved in a faceoff +3 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Troublemaker, you may put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire this card to put two +1 power counters on another one of your Friends. Immediate: Banish this card from your discard pile to put a +1 power counter on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: While this card is in your discard pile, your Mane Character has +1 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal a Friend this way, you may exhaust an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to choose an opposing Friend or unboosted Mane Character. That character loses and can't have abilities until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, start a faceoff involving this card and an opposing character. If you win, exhaust that opposing character. When you flip a card, you may put a +1 power counter on one of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your Troublemakers would be dismissed, you may exhaust this card to turn it face-down instead. This card can't be frightened.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may discard 2 cards. If you do, put two +1 power counters on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, choose two characters. Move them to random areas. When a character would be moved, if it is the first time a character would be moved this turn, that character is moved to a random area instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, gain control of an opposing Friend until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal an Event this way, draw 3 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of your turn, if you have fewer than 4 cards in your hand, you may draw cards until you have 4 or more cards in your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, draw a card. Immediate: Exhaust this card to draw a card

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may retire this card to put a number of 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend tokens into play equal to its power.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you have more Friends than an opponent, this card has +2 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When one of your non-token Friends enters play, put a 1 [Laughter] Earth Pony Friend token into play at each Problem. At the end of the turn, banish those tokens.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent confronts this card's Problem, you may dismiss an opposing Friend here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal an Event this way, put that Event into your hand and you may pay 1AT less to play it this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Troublemaker faceoff, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may move an opposing character.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: During a faceoff, put this card and an opposing Friend on top of their owners' decks.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play an Event, double this card's power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, if this card's Problem was not confronted, gain 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to choose a Problem. You need -4 [Wild] to confront that Problem until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Retire this card to put a Troublemaker from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play a Troublemaker, you need -2 [Wild] to confront this card's Problem until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal a Resource this way, you may put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents pay 1AT to play cards with cost 2 or less.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, gain control of an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. If you reveal a Friend this way, you may put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your characters at home.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your Score Phase, you may discard a card to put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your friends at home have Swift.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, choose a Troublemaker. You may put a number of 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play equal to that Troublemaker's power.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play. When this card enters play, put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: While this card is flipped, your characters have +1 power. When this card becomes involved in a faceoff, one of your characters at home becomes involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is sent or moved home, retire it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and discard a card to put a +1 power counter on this card. Main Phase: Exhaust this card and discard a card to move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a Problem faceoff involving this card, you may draw 2 cards and discard 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may pay 2AT less for your next Friend this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may discard a card to frighten a Friend. When this card enters your discard pile, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Troublemaker faceoff, you may frighten a Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card to put a Troublemaker from your hand into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a faceoff involving this card, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may frighten a Friend. Opponents pay 1AT to rally Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you move another character with 2 or less power, you may move this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you lose a Troublemaker faceoff involving this card, you may move one of your Friends at home to a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card can't be frightened. When a Troublemaker is uncovered, you may put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip an additional card during faceoffs involving this card. If you would put any number of flipped Friends on the bottom of your deck, you may put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, name a card. A player reveals their hand and discards all cards with that name.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a +1 power counter on a Friend or Troublemaker involved in the faceoff. Immediate: Exhaust this card to exhaust an opposing character involved in a faceoff

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your discard pile. Then, you may put a Friend from your discard pile into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to look at the top two cards of a player's deck. Put any number of them into their owner's discard pile and the rest back on top in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card and one of your Friends at home to add that Friend's power to another one one of your characters until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Remove two +1 power counters from this card to put two 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play. Main Phase: Retire two Critter Friends to put a 3 [Honesty] Rock Friend into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you draw a card, you may put a +1 power counter on one of your Troublemakers here. At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff, you may draw a card. Immediate: Exhaust this card to pay 1AT less for your next event this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When a Friend leaves play, your Mane Character gets +2 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, put a Friend with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play. When you play this card, you may put a Friend with cost 2 or less from your discard pile into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may retire a Friend to turn an opposing Troublemaker face-down. When one of your Friends is retired or dismissed, you may put a +1 power counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Exhaust this card and retire a Friend to look at the top card of a Problem deck and put it on the top or bottom of that deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may put a Troublemaker from your discard pile into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Opponents can't challenge your troublemakers unless they pay 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card does not count against your home limit. Immediate: Exhaust this card and discard 2 cards to give an opposing character involved in a faceoff -1 power for each of your characters at home until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Exhaust this card to gain 1AT. When an opponent confronts this card's Problem, that opponent loses 1AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an opponent starts a faceoff, you may put a 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend token into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the end of each opponent's turn, if this card's Problem was not confronted this turn, you may move one of your Critter friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, choose a color. This card is that color. This card has +1 power for each of your others characters.

property.name: Text
property.value: As this card enters play, choose a color. This card is that color. This card enters play with three +1 power counters on it. At the start of your turn, remove a +1 power counter from this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Move up to two of your characters, challenge an opposing Troublemaker with all your characters at its Problem, or pay 3AT less for the next Friend you play this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: As an additional cost to play this card, discard 2 cards. Banish an opposing Friend, Resource or Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Banish an opponent's flipped card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Retire a Friend to dismiss an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: As an additional cost to play this card, discard 2 cards. Give a character involved in a faceoff +2 power until the end of the faceoff.

card.name: Find the Purpose in Your Life

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Unfrighten up to two of your Friends, exhaust an opposing character and it does not ready during its controller's next ready step, or flip an additional card during faceoffs until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Dismiss a Resource, gain control of an opposing Troublemaker until the end of the turn, or put three 1 [Kindness] Critter Friend tokens into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: As an additional cost to play this card, discard 2 cards. Dismiss an opposing Friend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Banish a Friend with 3 or more power, you need -2 [Wild] to confront Problems until the end of the turn, or put a Troublemaker from your discard pile into play face-up.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Choose a color. One of your characters has +2 power and has that color until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Banish a Friend until the end of the turn, banish a Resource, or put three +1 counters on a Troublemaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Chaos: When this card is flipped, banish a Resource. Immediate: As an additional cost to play this card, discard 2 cards. Banish a Resource.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Choose one: Draw 4 cards, opponents need +2 [Wild] to confront Problems until the start of your next turn, or gain control of an opposing Friend until the end of the Score Phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: During the next Score Phase, there is an additional Confront Step for each Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: An opposing character involved in a faceoff gets -3 power until the end of the faceoff. You may discard a card. If you do, one of your cards involved in the faceoff gets +3 power until the end of the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Put a +1 power counter on each of your characters involved in a faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immediate: Put an opposing Friend with 3 or more power into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Dismiss an opposing Troublemaker. You may discard a card. If you do, gain control of that Troublemaker instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Problem. You can have an additional face-up Troublemaker at this Problem. When an opponent challenges one of your Troublemakers here, each of your Troublemakers here becomes involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this Problem is solved, score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, choose an opposing Troublemaker. That card doesn't prevent you from confronting its Problem this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play on a Friend or Troublemaker. That card has +2 power. If that card would be dismissed, you may put it into its owner's hand instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the end of each opponent's turn, if no Problems were confronted this turn, you may distribute two +1 power counter on up to two of your Friends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play at your home. At the start of your turn, put a Trainee counter on this card. When you put a Trainee counter on this card, if there are 5 or more Trainee counters on this card, retire it. When this card leaves play, for each Trainee counter on it, put a 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus Friend token with Swift into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, put a token copy of this card into play face-up at each other Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each opponent's turn, you may choose Event, Resource, or Troublemaker. That opponent pay 3AT to play cards of the chosen type until the start of their next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While an opponent has more Friends than you, this card has +3 power.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, you may pay 2AT to put an opposing Friend into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is uncovered, move all characters here home.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is defeated, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mane Characters can't contribute their power to faceoffs involving this card. Opponents can't play Troublemakers here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may exhaust an opposing character here.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a Resource from your discard pile into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a 1 [Loyalty] Pegasus token with Swift into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Pay 2AT and discard 2 cards to choose a color and put a 2 power colorless Changeling Friend token with that color into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mane Characters can't contribute their power to confronting this Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may put a +1 power counter on one of your Troublemakers.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may move one of your Friends at home to a Problem.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this Problem, you may draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's problem, turn this card over.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card has +1 power for each of your Friends with 2 or less printed power.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Earth Pony, Pegasus, Unicorn, Dragon, Draconequus

property.name: Text
property.value: When you win a Troublemaker faceoff involving this card, score an additional point.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of a faceoff, this card becomes involved in the faceoff.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, each player chooses a Friend, Resource, and Troublemaker they control, and retires the rest.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, dismiss an opposing Friend and each other opposing Friend with the same name.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, you may play a Friend from your hand without paying its cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you play this card, move each character to this card's Problem. Opponents can't move characters away from here unless they pay 2AT.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you confront this card's Problem, you may frighten this card to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Main Phase: Reveal cards from the top of an opponent's deck until you reveal a Friend. Put that Friend into play under your control, then that opponent shuffles their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. At the end of your turn, each player discards a card. When you win a Problem faceoff, you may banish a Friend, Resource, Event, and Troublemaker from your discard pile to score a point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play to your home. Opponents pay 1AT to play cards during faceoffs. Opposing flipped cards lose and can't have abilities. At the start of your turn, you may pay 2AT and exhaust this card to score a point.
